short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to trace precedents and dependents in Google Sheets using keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Transform Your Google Sheet Experience with Gorilla Sheet - for Free! 🚀

Supercharge your productivity with Gorilla Sheet, the game-changing Chrome extension that's perfect for anyone looking to maximize efficiency in Google Sheets. Whether you're a strategic finance associate, FP&A analyst, biz ops manager, marketing wizard or a dedicated Google Sheet user, Gorilla Sheet is designed to make navigating Google Sheets simple and secure. 🌟

🔑 Key Features
🔗 Trace Precedents & Dependents: Instantly pinpoint input cells and understand data origins and destinations with ease.
          Trace Precedents: Ctrl / Control + Shift + [
          Trace Dependents: Ctrl / Control + Shift + ]
           ⌨️ Excel Shortcuts: Bring the power of familiar Excel shortcuts into Google Sheets to cut 
                 down on repetitive tasks.
           🚀 Advanced Navigation: Quickly navigate between sheets and cells, saving time and 
                 enhancing your data handling.
           🔒 Zero Data Recording: Your data remains yours alone. We are committed to our no- 
                 data-collection policy.
🦍 Why Gorilla Sheet?
         💸 Completely Free: Enhance your spreadsheets without a hit to your budget.
         ⚡ Boost Productivity: Integrate powerful tools that make data manipulation faster and 
                your workflow smoother.
         🛡️ Enhanced Privacy: Your data's confidentiality and integrity are our top priority—no data 
                storage or analysis.
         🔗 Seamless Integration: Installs directly into Google Sheets with minimal permissions, 
                maintaining robust functionality without the bloat.

Gorilla Sheet isn't just an extension; it's an indispensable tool that deeply integrates to transform your spreadsheet tasks. 
🌐 Install Gorilla Sheet for free today and start transforming your spreadsheet experience immediately! 🎯

🖥️ We support both Windows and Mac. If you have any questions, contact us at sukh@gorillasheet.com 📧

Embrace the power of Gorilla Sheet and take your spreadsheet skills to the next level! 🚀🌟
